pageContent.title: <Introtext style="font-family:Helvetica; font-size:14pt; font-weight:bold; color:#cc0033; margin:10px -5px 10px 5px; padding:5px 0 5px 5px; background:#e8e8e8; border-bottom:1px solid #333; display:block;">Collecting Information and Determining Next Steps</Introtext>
pageContent.title2: Meeting with Dr. Hayes – Collecting Information and Determining Next Steps
pageContent.instructions: <welcomeText style=" font-family:Helvetica; font-size:11pt; line-height:18pt; text-align:justify; font-weight:bold; color:#333; display:block; margin:0 10px 10px">Which question will you ask Dr. Hayes next?</welcomeText>

choice.choiceText: A. I understand the challenges that you’re facing in your practice. How do you suggest that we discuss, with your entire staff, both the challenges and the ways that we can help you with them?

B. It’s clear that patient satisfaction will be critical in order to achieve the growth you’re targeting, as higher satisfaction will lead to more referrals. What are the specific patient satisfaction goals you’re trying to achieve?

C. Successfully treating your patients seems to be the foundation for your patient outcome goals. What are your thoughts regarding how expanding the base of products you prescribe could help achieve better patient outcomes?
D. Will you prescribe my product for your next depressed patient?
